PerfectNetExp.abs: 山荔枝(pulasan)、蛇皮果、龙贡等这些热带水果～山荔枝(pulasan)个人不是很清楚、不了解，蛇皮果～在印尼曾经亲自品尝过…有点 …
本地水果、乾果名称 &amp;... ... pisang kaki 柿子 pulasan 野红毛丹 rambai 榔拜.
丹阳 in English, translation, example... ... 金丹 elixir of life 金毛丹 pulasan 克菌丹 captan.
pulandian 小城市, pulasan 易变韶子, pulandian 普兰店市

means.word_mean: 1. East Indian fruit tree bearing fruit similar to but sweeter than that of the rambutan
2. fruit of an East Indian tree similar to the rambutan but sweeter
